members.name: Alexey Karalkin
members.description: Has demonstrated outstanding results in the energy sector for more than 15 years, including construction and maintenance of utility networks.

members.name: Georgy Firsov
members.description: A true wizard in the world of technical systems. His unique talent allows him to "hear" and "understand" machines, turning even the most complex and capricious ones into obedient and efficient devices.

members.name: Gennady Gavrichev
members.description: Known as the team's "golden hands," capable of creating a perfect system from any, even the most unruly components.
